title: Panel
description: multi paneled, quilt look dark brown cloth; strips of dark brown and green embroidery on black and white gingham; embroidered areas look like quilted squares; interspersed with gingham panels are dark brown panels with long, loose rust colored or medium brown threads attached at intervals as part of the design; holes in fabric where loose threads are attached
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
